thrasthawadi balawega paradawa shri lankawa labu wishishta jayagrahanaya pilibanda hondin danna lokaya gewunu siwu wasare apa labu aarthika jayagrahana pilibandawa danne itha sulu washayen bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.apa rata aarthika washayen labu sarthakathwaya pilibandawa loka madhyayangen pracharayak labune nathath kemen ee sarthakathwaya piliganna jagath wyaparika prajawa dan eeta prashansa karamin sitina bawath janadhipathiwaraya kiweya.janadhipathiwaraya me adahas pala kele ayifa sammana ulelata samagamiwa kolambaa hiltan hotalaye sanwidhanaya kara thibu goliya wyaparika hamuwata eeye (04) ek wemini.maragena marena bombakaruwan, lama soldaduwan, durastha palaka bomba, asathya pracharaka krama yanadi anga lokayata handunwa demin thrasthawadayata nawa muhunuwarak dun el. ti. ti. ee ya parajaya kirimata shri lankawa samath wu bawath janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya. 2006 sita 2008 dakwa kalaye siyayata 6 ka aarthika wardhana samanyayak pawathwa gena yamata rajaya samath wu bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya 2008 di siyayata 22 kwa thibu uddhamanaya 2009 wana wita siyayata 4 dakwa pahala watunu bawath kiweya.waraya, guwan thotupala, mahamarga, widuli bala, jala sapayum, dhiwara waraya, dumriya saha palam yanadi yatithala pahasukam athin apa rata mahath diyunuwak laba athi bawath wideshiya winimaya thanpathu degunayakin wardhanaya wi wirakiyawa siyayata 5.7 dakwa aduwi athi bawath janadhipathiwaraya mehidi kiweya.“dilindukama shighrayen pahatha wati atha.
